about.description: Hi, I’m Peter! With 8 years of experience as a frontend developer, I’ve built dynamic, user-friendly web applications using my favorite tools: React and Angular. This is my digital space where passion for clean code meets creativity. Beyond the lines of code, I’m an avid traveler, a sports enthusiast, and someone who finds inspiration in nature and animals. Whether I'm crafting seamless user experiences or exploring new horizons, I bring energy, curiosity, and a touch of adventure to everything I do. Dive into my projects, learn about my journey, and let’s connect!

works.description:
I’ve had the privilege of working on a variety of projects, some of which are so secret, even the droids don’t know about them. Unfortunately, due to the strict privacy policies of the galactic tech companies I've worked for, I can't reveal the exact names of the apps or the battles I've fought in. But trust me, I’ve contributed to some out-of-this-world applications, ranging from health insurance (helping people navigate the galaxy of benefits), streaming services (so you can binge-watch your favorite shows without the force of lag), backoffices (keeping things running smoothly behind the scenes), and even node and angular migrations (moving data faster than a TIE fighter on hyperdrive).

But when I'm not working on secret projects, I spend my free time developing fun little applications just for the fun of it – and to learn new skills along the way. Think of them like the Mandalorian armor of my portfolio: practical, stylish, and always improving.

From simple projects that bring joy (because who doesn’t love a good meme generator or a space-themed to-do list?) to more complex explorations, I’m always experimenting, learning, and pushing the boundaries of what’s possible. Each app is a chance to hone my craft and have a little fun in the process. You can think of these as my lightsabers — ever-evolving, always sharpening my skills to deliver top-tier experiences.

So while I can’t show you the inner workings of my previous galactic projects, I invite you to join me on this adventure through my own creations. From simple fun apps to sophisticated frontend interfaces, everything here is crafted with passion, expertise, and a pinch of Star Wars magic. Welcome aboard!

May the code be with you!
works.project_1_description: Peter's Frontend World is my personal portfolio, built to showcase my journey as a frontend developer. Designed with React and ThreeJS and styled for an intuitive experience, it’s a hub for exploring my skills, projects, and passion for web development.
works.project_2_description: A weather and country explorer app where you can search and filter countries, view details like capital, currency, and language, and check the latest weather forecast for your selected destination.
